services.name: AI Integration & Workflow Automation Strategy
services.description: Strategic advisory for businesses looking to leverage Generative AI and automation. I assess your current workflows, identify high-impact opportunities for AI integration, and design a strategic roadmap for implementation. This includes selecting the right AI tools (like Copilot, Gemini, and other agentic systems), defining spec-driven development processes, and ensuring your team is equipped to build and maintain AI-powered solutions efficiently.

services.name: Cloud-Native Architecture & Design
services.description: Expert architectural design for building scalable, resilient, and cost-effective applications on AWS. I work with your team to design robust microservices architectures, define best practices for serverless computing, and create a blueprint for your cloud infrastructure that aligns with your long-term business goals and security requirements.

services.name: Infrastructure as Code & CI/CD Pipeline Implementation
services.description: I build and configure your complete cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines using modern DevOps practices. This service includes writing production-grade Terraform code to manage your AWS resources and setting up automated CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions for reliable, repeatable, and fast deployments.

services.name: Custom CLI & Automation Tool Development
services.description: Development of custom command-line interface (CLI) tools and automation scripts in Go to solve your team's specific challenges. Whether it's for automating deployments, managing infrastructure, or simplifying complex workflows, I build robust, cross-platform tools that make your engineering team faster and more effective.

services.name: REST API & Microservices Implementation
services.description: Backend development focused on building secure, well-documented, and high-performance REST APIs and microservices. Using Go and modern frameworks, I implement services that are designed for scalability and maintainability, forming the backbone of your web and mobile applications. Also interested in advanced solutions using Python.

services.name: Full-Stack Web Development
services.description: End-to-end web application development using modern technologies. From front-end interfaces with React and TypeScript to robust back-end systems in Go or Python, I deliver scalable, maintainable solutions that are deployed on secure AWS infrastructure and meet your business requirements.
